alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 27 at 1:47PM CDT until March 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH 9 PM TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR ALL OF THE TEXAS AND OKLAHOMA PANHANDLES... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM Tuesday morning through 9 PM Tuesday evening. * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Texas and Beaver. In Texas... Hansford...Ochiltree...Lipscomb...Roberts...Hemphill...Gray... Wheeler and Collingsworth. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts around 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...As high as 4 to 6. * Timing...Critical fire weather conditions are possible starting around 10 AM Tuesday morning and ending around 9 PM Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
